subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Dressage (Equestrian Sport)
Horses
Dancing
lead_paragraph: After watching three hours of dressage, a dance critic concludes that while the ballet-for-horses description is apt, there are still questions perhaps only a horse can answer.
snippet: After watching three hours of dressage, a dance critic concludes that while the ballet-for-horses description is apt, there are still questions perhaps only a horse can answer.
